name: azureml-train

chunks.text:
##########################################################################################
Microsoft Azure Machine Learning - azureml-train package
##########################################################################################

The azureml-train package has been deprecated and might not receive future updates and removed from the distribution altogether. Please use azureml-train-core instead.

usage_description: This library is used to enable developers to train machine learning models on Microsoft Azure, providing a core set of functionality for model training that can be used in conjunction with other Azure ML packages. However, due to its deprecation, it's recommended to use the `azureml-train-core` package instead for future-proof and supported development.
